```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(dplyr)
library(rtweet)
library(tidyr)
library(tidytext)
library(readr)
library(vsp)
library(wordcloud2)
library(shiny)
#read data
wordfreq_bydate_top50_wocoro<-readRDS("wordfreq_bydate_top50_wocoron.rds")
```



Tweet Explore
=================================================================

Column{.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
### Choose a date you want to see (data available from 02/01 to 03/31)

```{r}
dateInput('date',
      label = 'Date input:',
      value = '2020-02-01'
)

wordOfDate<-reactive({
  index<-as.character(input$date)
  wordfreq_bydate_top50_wocoro[[index]]
})
```

Column 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Word Cloud

```{r}
renderWordcloud2(
  wordcloud2(wordOfDate(), size = 1.6, color = 'random-dark')
)
```
